message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,500. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate it, but I can only pay up to $13,500 for the product. Let me know if this works for you!

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low. I'm willing to come down to $14,000.  This is still a great deal for you, considering the product's value to you. Let's see if we can close this deal.
Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I can only afford $13,800. I hope this meets in the middle for us.
